channel.title: Make a beginner bank with items
channel.description:
How would add items to the players bank when they first join (starter bank) something like the commonly used 'starter inventory' all i want to add is like, whip, runes, food, etc... and also if i added this, would it only work for the first time when they log in, and not every time they re-log. if you can help me with this, i would love you, this is the completion to this new server i've been working on, kthxbai.
Help Appreciated,
Greg

item.title: Make a beginner bank with items
